About us
Our firm

With a humble beginning in 2013, the entrepreneurial endeavour of Suresh, Nithin and Sharath began with quality and commitment as the mission. Thus originated the firm S L Construction. Today, the firm continues to stick to the mission with which it began and remembers with gratitude its patrons and hopes for a bright future.
